title: 怎么给玩家spawnpoint指令的权限啊？？？这个指令不是ess里的么？？？
author: kingmm

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder bukkit.command.spawnpoint
/mangaddp builder minecraft.command.spawnpoint

分别输入这两个试试

原版权限。。
